Summary: on the tip of our exosphere 1000k or so a light changed direction
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Saco
There were no other sightings in Saco on or around July 7th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThere was a few clouds but can see stars. He saw a small light that looked like a satellite. He said it was a little red to it. It was about 1000k in the exosphere, straight up above his head. At first he thought it was a satellite, then saw it change direction and taken off at a fast rate in a second. And disappeared out of sight. This report is what my husband told me. I am reporting this for him. The above is what he told me. Hes just not educated like me in the UFO information. Thank you for all your hard work. MUFON
